name: Antidote Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It cures poisoned targets. Antidote potions replaced Cure Poison Runes in Rookgaard.

name: Banana Chocolate Shake

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Its actual status changes are currently unknown, if it has any at all.
When using a Banana Chocolate Shake, Hearts Effect  will appear on the user who will get the following message: "You don't really know what this did to you, but suddenly you feel very happy."
To create this dish, you must speak with the Djinn Jean Pierre in Ankrahmun, near the Marid Fortress, during the Hot Cuisine event.
Necessary Ingredients:

1 Bar of Chocolate 
1 Cream Cake 
2 Bananas 
2 Vials of Milk 
1 Sling Herb 
1 Star Herb 
It can be obtained through the Hot Cuisine Quest and from a Brass-Shod Chest inside the Cobra Bastion.

name: Beer

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
When you drink beer, you become temporarily drunk and not able to move correctly. Each drink gets you drunk for 2 more minutes up to a limit of ten minutes. You can also get beer by using any liquid container on a Beer Cask. When buying beer from a pub, it will usually come in a Mug.Looks the same as a Flask with Magical Oil, a Flask with Oil and Blood, and vials of Mead, Mud, Oil, Rum and Tea.
2 vials of beer are needed in the Hot Cuisine Quest.

name: Berserk Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It increases your Melee skills (Sword, Axe and Club) by 5 each, and decreases your Shielding skill by 10 points for 10 minutes. It does not increase your fist skill and it can only be used by Knights.
Note: It will negate any fighting skill boost such as Enchant Party, Blood Rage or Veggie Casserole. Be careful - there is a 1-2 second delay for drinking this, therefore you can easily waste a potion instead of using the intended one. It does not matter if you drink 1 or 100 at once; there will be no extra bonuses.
Can be obtained in the Berserk Potion Quest, The New Frontier Quest, Waterskin of Mead Quest, and the Rise of Devovorga. Can also be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Bestiary Betterment

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will make kills count twice for the Bestiary for one hour.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Blood Preservation

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkCreature ProductsLiquids

notes:
Notes
It can be sold to NPCs, and as with other creature products, has among the highest gold-to-oz ratio of all items.

name: Blood

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Blood is normally useless (except for keeping us alive), only has use in some quests. You can get it by 'using' a liquid Container on a monster corpse who is not undead or invertebrate. For example, you won't get blood from skeletons, but you will get blood from hunters or bears.
Item used in The Pits of Inferno Quest, The Queen of the Banshees Quest, Blood Brothers Quest and Unnatural Selection Quest.

name: Bottle of Bug Milk

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquidsQuest Items

notes:
Notes
It's the special Item from Ab'Dendriel.Looks the same as a Rum Flask.

Item needed in the Searoutes around Yalahar mission of In Service of Yalahar Quest. This item is also needed, during the Hot Cuisine Quest, in the final recipe to make Sweet Mangonaise Elixir.

name: Box with Balm

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Bullseye Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion increases distance skill by 5 points while decreasing shielding by 10 points for 10 minutes. You can only have one distance boosting skill active at a time, i.e. you cannot use this and Sharpshooter, Carrot Cake, or Lemon Cupcake at the same time.
Obtainable in the Barbarian Arena Quest, Formorgar Mine Quest, Frost Dragon Quest, The New Frontier Quest, and the Rise of Devovorga. Can also be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Charm Upgrade

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will increase offensive Charm trigger chances by 5% (except Cripple) for one hour.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Coconut Milk

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Use a Juice Squeezer  on a coconut  while carrying a empty vial  to make Coconut Milk.
7 vials of Coconut Milk are needed for the Hot Cuisine Quest.

name: Death Amplification

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will increase your targets sensitivity to your Death Damage attacks by 8% for one hour. It only affects attacks against monsters.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will increase your Death Damage protection by 8% for one hour.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Drinks

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
A blue drink, a green drink, and a red drink on top of a Table (Picnic).

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

name: Empty Ritual Flask

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It can be found inside the Cobra Bastion, here. It spawns multiple times per day when the room "resets". Using it on a dead Cobra will result in a Flask with Snake Poison.

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes

This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.

name: Fire Resilience

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will increase your Fire Damage protection by 8% for one hour.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Flask of Demonic Blood

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkCreature ProductsLiquids

notes:
Notes
It turns into a Strong Mana Potion or Strong Health Potion and the Blood Effect  appears when you shake it by using it.It looks the same as a Strong Health Potion. See also: Concentrated Demonic Blood/Statistics  250 are needed for the achievement Demonic Barkeeper and 1 is needed for the Hot Cuisine Quest.

name: Flask of Embalming Fluid

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkCreature ProductsLiquids
attributes.Imbuements: Basic Lich ShroudIntricate Lich ShroudPowerful Lich Shroud

notes:
Notes
One of these is needed for The Cursed Crystal Quest.One is required for making a Prepared Bucket, which are needed for the Thornfire World Change.25 of them are needed for the Basic Lich Shroud imbuement.

name: Flask of Hallucinogen

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquidsQuest Items

notes:
Notes
Item used on Kilmaresh Quest - Fafnar's Wrath.

name: Flask of Rust Remover

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Can be used to remove the rust from Rusty Armors, Rusty Helmets, Rusty Legs, and Rusty Shields. You have a chance of getting nothing when the following message will appear: The armor was already damaged so badly that it broke when you tried to clean it.
Completing the The Hidden City of Beregar Quest - Justice for All allows you to purchase this item.Successfully polish 1000 items with this item grants you the Polisher achievement.

name: Flask with Beaver Bait

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkQuest ItemsLiquids

notes:
Notes
Looks the same as a vial of Slime, an Animal Cure, Wonder Glue, a Flask with Paint, a Flask of Poison, and a Flask of Plant Poison.
Temporarily obtained in The New Frontier Quest.

name: Flask with Magical Oil

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquidsQuest Items

notes:
Notes
Eclesius will make this if you give him the right ingredients. It disappears once used.
Looks the same as a Flask with Oil and Blood and vials of Beer, Mead, Mud, Oil, Rum and Tea.
Used in The Scatterbrained Sorcerer Quest. You need Vial of Oil, a Skull, a Red Apple and a Wolf Paw to make it.

name: Flask with Oil and Blood

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquidsQuest Items

notes:
Notes
It looks the same as a Flask with Magical Oil and vials of Beer, Mead, Mud, Oil, Rum and Tea.
Obtained and used in The Cursed Crystal Quest.

name: Flask with Snake Poison

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It's an Empty Ritual Flask that was filled with Cobra poison. It disappears some time after being filled.
If you use it on the Large Cauldron inside the Cobra Bastion, here, all the Cobras will start spawning with 75% of their total hitpoints. The effect lasts for 30 minutes.

name: Fresh Mushroom Beer

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Fresh Mushroom Beer turns into Stale Mushroom Beer 20 seconds after buying it from NPC.
Needed in Bigfoot's Burden Quest if you fail the recruitment test.

name: Fruit Juice

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Use a Juice Squeezer on a Fruit while carrying an empty vial to make juice from your favourite fruit. Check table of fruits you may use here. It doesn't matter which fruit you use to make the juice, it will always be yellow.
One vial of this liquid is needed during The Isle of Evil Quest, and another five are needed during the Krailos Quest.

name: Grave Flower Extract

attributes.Classification: Other ItemsLiquidsQuest Items

notes:
Notes
Obtained by distilling a Grave Flower. 
Part of the Feaster of Souls Quest.

name: Great Health Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Great Health Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. The keg can only be used by the character who purchased it in the Store. For this reason, the potions filled using the keg need to fit the character's vocation and level. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Great Health Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Heals the user for 425 to 575 hitpoints, an average of 500. The leftover empty potion flask can be sold back to the potion vendor for 5 gp. For comparisons of healing efficiency, see the GP/HP and the Cap/HP efficiency tables.Due to their common drop rate among a wide variety of monsters, you can often find them on the market for half the NPC price.
Can be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Great Mana Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Great Mana Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. The keg can only be used by the character who purchased it in the Store. For this reason, the potions filled using the keg need to fit the character's vocation and level. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Great Mana Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It has a 5 gp deposit. It restores approximately 150 - 250 Mana Points. See the GP/MP and the Cap/MP efficiency tables for more information.
Can be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Great Spirit Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Great Spirit Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. The keg can only be used by the character who purchased it in the Store. For this reason, the potions filled using the keg need to fit the character's vocation and level. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Great Spirit Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It has a 5 gp deposit. Heals around 300 hp and 150 mp simultaneously.
See GP/MP, GP/HP, Cap/MP and Cap/HP efficiency tables for more information.

name: Health Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Health Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Health Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Heals the target for 125 to 175 hitpoints, an average of 150. The leftover empty potion flask can be sold back to the potion vendor for 5 gp. For comparisons of healing efficiency, see the GP/HP and the Cap/HP efficiency tables. Notice that you can only use this potion on yourself or another player, it doesn't work for summoned or wild creatures.
See Health Potions for further information
4 of them can be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Ink (Liquid)

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
You can get Ink by using an empty liquid container on a dead Biting Book. 
Five vials of ink are required during the Kilmaresh Quest.

name: Interdimensional Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquidsQuest Items

notes:
Notes
Received and used during the Wrath of the Emperor Quest, Mission 09.

name: Kooldown-Aid

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will reset all active spell cooldowns.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stack the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Lemonade

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This can be received for free out of Lemonade Casks found in various locations around Tibia.

name: Lifefluid

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It heals 60 hp. Looks the same as blood. Players now use Health Potions instead, as since Update 8.1 they can't be bought in shops anymore. A Mug of Lifefluid 
spawns daily on the Green Claw Swamp, here.

    Daily respawn

name: Magic Shield Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
When drunk, this potion will activate Magic Shield for 3 minutes and all damage taken will reduce your Mana instead of your Hit Points.

name: Mana Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Mana Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. The keg can only be used by the character who purchased it in the Store. For this reason, the potions filled using the keg need to fit the character's vocation and level. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Mana Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It has a 5 gp deposit. It regenerates 75 to 125 mana with an average of 100 mana.
There are many opinions whether Life Rings are more efficient than Ring of Healing, Manafluids or Mana Potions. 
See the GP/MP and the Cap/MP efficiency tables for more information.
4 of them can be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Manafluid

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Manafluid is a fluid just like blood and water. It restores between 50 and 150 mana. Until the introduction of potions, the manafluid was the only item to regenerate mana instantly. 
These days you can obtain it from different places as Daily Respawns:

Potion Stands in Yalahar Magician Quarter (only when there's a full Floor Reset, which is rare)
In multiple places around Glooth Factory, e.g. here. (Probably only after a full Floor Reset as well)
Time Travel Dungeon (here)
Near Marapur's Training School, here
You can move it into another fluid containers. It looks the same as Wine.

Manafluid spawns in a Potion Stand in the Magician Quarter.Manafluid in a Potion Stand in the Time Travel Dungeon.

name: Mastermind Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Increases your Magic Level by 3 for 10 minutes. Only sorcerers and druids may drink this potion. This potion does not stack with Enchant Party. Only one of these effects can be active at a time. Casting Enchant Party will override Mastermind Potion's effect and vice-versa. It does not reduce your defence, shielding etc like some people thought.
Obtainable in the Barbarian Arena Quest, Mastermind Potion Quest, The New Frontier Quest, and the Rise of Devovorga. Can also be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Mead

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
When you drink mead, you become temporarily drunk and not able to move correctly. It's a common drink on cold areas.Looks the same as a Flask with Magical Oil, a Flask with Oil and Blood, and vials of Beer, Mud, Oil, Rum and Tea.
1 vial of Mead is needed in the Hot Cuisine Quest.

name: Milk

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Needed to make a Lump of Cake Dough which is used to bake cake.Milk is the source of the Minotaurs' power.
Can be found at daily spawns in Mintwallin, Fibula Dungeon. Can also be acquired through the Goblin Temple Quest. 3 vials of milk are needed in the Hot Cuisine Quest.

name: Muck Remover

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It can be used on a Mucus Plug to remove the mucus and reveal its contents. 
You can get the achievement Goo Goo Dancer by using 100 Muck Removers on Mucus Plugs.

name: Mud

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Can be obtained by "using" a Liquid Container on a pool of mud - usually in caves.Looks the same as a Flask with Magical Oil, a Flask with Oil and Blood, and vials of Mead, Beer, Oil, Rum and Tea.

name: Oil

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Used to refill lamps (only works if the oil is in a vial).Looks the same as a Flask with Magical Oil, a Flask with Oil and Blood, and vials of Mead, Mud, Beer, Rum and Tea.

name: Physical Amplification

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will increase your targets sensitivity to your Physical Damage attacks by 8% for one hour. It only affects attacks against monsters.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Physical Resilience

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will increase your Physical Damage protection by 8% for one hour.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Pint of Glooth (Green)

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This is an unused Pint of Glooth that has been sitting idle for 10 minutes. If you don't use it, it will become a Pint of Glooth (Stale) after 10 minutes. You can consume this green pint of glooth by using it on your character. Upon doing so, your character will experience the Yellow Notes Effect  and you'll sing.

name: Pint of Glooth (Stale)

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This is an unused Pint of Glooth (Green) that has been sitting idle for 10 minutes. You can consume this stale pint of glooth by using it on your character. Upon doing so, your character will experience the Poison Effect  and you'll receive the following message: The glooth is a little stale, but very refreshing.

name: Pint of Glooth

attributes.Classification: Other ItemsQuest ItemsLiquids

notes:
Notes
You can get this item for free by asking Roswitha for a Pint otherwise say Drink at the cost of 10. By drinking it, you will be transformed into a Rot Elemental for 30 seconds. If you don't use it, it will become a Pint of Glooth (Green) after 10 minutes. Used in the Oramond Quest - Dr. Merlay's Misery.

name: Rum

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
When you drink rum, you become temporarily drunk and not able to move correctly. You can also get rum by using any liquid container on a Rum Cask, which can be found in Sabrehaven and Liberty Bay.It looks the same as a Flask with Magical Oil, a Flask with Oil and Blood, and vials of Mead, Mud, Oil, Beer and Tea.



How to make Rum
To make rum, you need:
Fire Bug
Sickle
Distilling Machine
Any fluid container like vials or mugs.
1. Use the fire bug on Sugar Canes to burn away the useless leaves.
2. Use the sickle to cut it and collect the Bunch of Sugar Canes.
3. Use the bunch of sugar canes with a Distilling Machine.
4. Use the fluid container on the distilling machine to get the rum.

Note: Each bunch of sugar cane provides 10 seconds of rum production.

You need a Rum Flask of rum in the 'Searoutes around Yalahar' mission of the In Service of Yalahar Quest. You also need 10 vials of rum in the second mission of The Isle of Evil Quest.

name: Slime (Liquid)

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
When you drink slime, you will become poisoned for 3 minutes. Damage is equal to the damage from a Poison Field.
You can collect slime in any liquid container by using the container on the corpse of any creature with green blood (most poison creatures), or you can fill it at a swamp.
Note: be careful of a scam involving giving slime to a player in order to kill him.
Looks the same as Wonder Glue, an Animal Cure, a Flask with Beaver Bait, a Flask with Paint, a Flask of Poison, and a Flask of Plant Poison.

name: Small Flask of Eyedrops

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkCreature ProductsLiquids

notes:
Notes
It can be sold to NPCs but it is not recommended because it has a use during June. As other creature products, has among the highest gold-to-oz ratio of all items. 
Used in the Witches' Cauldron Quest.

name: Small Health Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It has a 5 gp deposit. It heals 60 to 90 Hit Points, or about 75 Hit Points on average. The leftover empty flask can be sold back to the potion vendor for 5 gp.
For comparisons of healing efficiency, see the GP/HP and the Cap/HP efficiency tables.
Obtained from Small Health Potion Quest.

name: Stale Mushroom Beer

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Becomes stale when Fresh Mushroom Beer is left to sit for 20 seconds.

name: Stamina Extension

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will refill one hour of Stamina, but not above the maximum.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Strike Enhancement

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will increase the Critical Hit chance by 5% for one hour.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Strong Health Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Strong Health Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. The keg can only be used by the character who purchased it in the Store. For this reason, the potions filled using the keg need to fit the character's vocation and level. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Strong Health Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Heals the target for 250 to 350 hitpoints with an average of 300. The leftover empty potion flask can be sold back to the potion vendor for 5 gp. For comparisons of healing efficiency, see the GP/HP and the Cap/HP efficiency tables.Looks the same as Flask of Demonic Blood.Due to their common drop rate among a wide variety of monsters, you can often find them on the market for half the NPC price.
2 of them can be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Strong Mana Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Strong Mana Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. The keg can only be used by the character who purchased it in the Store. For this reason, the potions filled using the keg need to fit the character's vocation and level. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Strong Mana Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It has a 5 gp deposit. It regenerates 115 to 185 mana with an average of 150. See the GP/MP and the Cap/MP efficiency tables for more information.
2 of them can be obtained from Gnomish Supply Packages.

name: Supreme Health Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Supreme Health Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. The keg can only be used by the character who purchased it in the Store. For this reason, the potions filled using the keg need to fit the character's vocation and level. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Supreme Health Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Heals the user for 875-1125 hitpoints, an average of 1000 hitpoints. The leftover empty flask can be sold back to the potion vendor for 5 gp. For comparisons of healing efficiency, see the GP/HP and the Cap/HP efficiency tables.

name: Sweet Mangonaise Elixir

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this elixir will create 10 copies of the ring you are wearing. It only works with rings that have a time duration.
It can only be used when wearing an acceptable ring, otherwise you'll get the following message: "You can only drink this elixir while wearing a time-based ring you'd like to charge."
When successfully using a Sweet Mangonaise Elixir, Green Sparkles Effect  will appear on the user who will get the following message: "Your <ring name> multiplied!"
To get this dish, you must speak with the Djinn Jean Pierre in Ankrahmun, near the Marid Fortress, during the Hot Cuisine event.
Necessary Ingredients:

40 Eggs 
20 Mangoes 
10 Honeycombs 
1 Bottle of Bug Milk 
1 Blessed Wooden Stake 
Obtainable through the Hot Cuisine Quest.

name: Tea

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It is a very nice drink for cold climates.Looks the same as a Flask with Magical Oil, a Flask with Oil and Blood, and vials of Mead, Mud, Oil, Rum and Beer.

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Heals the user for 650 to 850 hitpoints, with an average of 750. The leftover empty potion flask can be sold back to the potion vendor for 5 gp. For comparisons of healing efficiency, see the GP/HP and the Cap/HP efficiency tables.

Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.

name: Ultimate Mana Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
It has a 5 gp deposit. It restores from 425 to 575 Mana Points. See the GP/MP and the Cap/MP efficiency tables for more information.

name: Ultimate Spirit Keg

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
This item is available in the Store only. It fills up to 500 Ultimate Spirit Potions. All potions created this way as well as the keg itself will be kept in Your Store Inbox. A keg is not only useful for providing potions in a hunting ground, it also saves you some capacity as its constant weight equals the net weight of 250 potions. Once the keg is empty it will vanish into thin air.
 See also: Cask & Keg Value Effectiveness

name: Ultimate Spirit Potion

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Heals the player for 420-580 hitpoints (an average of 500) and 150-250 mana (an average of 200) simultaneously. It has a 5 gp deposit.
See GP/MP, GP/HP, Cap/MP and Cap/HP efficiency tables for more information.

name: Urine

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Can be found in a trough at a daily respawn in a Hostel located south of the Thaian depot. It can also be found in the basements of most Venorean shops, near the mailbox in Orc Fort, and at many other places all over Tibia.

name: Vial of Liquid Silver

attributes.Classification: Other ItemsLiquidsQuest Items

notes:
Notes
Used in Grimvale Quest - Obtaining the Liquid Silver Trap. Hand it along with the Closed Trap to Maeryn in order to obtain a Closed Silvered Trap.

name: Vial with a Skull Cork

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquidsQuest Items

notes:
Notes
Part of the Feaster of Souls Quest.

name: Water (Liquid)

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
To get water, simply "use" a Fluid Containers on another container holding water, on a shoreline, a Draw Well, a Fountain, a Rain Barrel (Open), a Water Cask, or a Wall Fountain.
It looks the same as a Vial of Elemental Water, Holy Water and Quara Ink.
1 of them is required for both the Dreamer's Challenge Quest and the Arito's Task Quest. 2 vials of water are needed in the Hot Cuisine Quest.

name: Wealth Duplex

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
Drinking this potion will double the loot from every regular monster you kill for one hour.
This potion can be obtained every two weeks by either ranking among the top 20 in the Tibiadrome leaderboards or by being raffled among the remaining participants.
There is a cooldown of 24 hours after drinking this potion. Since this is an individual cooldown, someone may stacks the effects of multiple Tibiadrome Potions.

name: Wine

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkLiquids

notes:
Notes
When you drink wine, you become temporarily drunk and not able to move correctly. You can also get wine by using any liquid container on a Wine Cask. Used as a scam because it looks the same as manafluid.
18 vials of wine are needed in a mission of What a Foolish Quest and 1 is needed for the Hot Cuisine Quest.
